net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_Util_Parser_expandProperties
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Given a string like:
"This Little Pony has {numberOfHeads} heads, each with a bonus of {bonus.head}"
would return the string with properties 'numberOfHeads' and 'bonus.head' expanded. For
any property name that doesn't exist, the value is expanded to an empty string. An optional
second parameter may be passed to expand these values to a desired default value (like 0)

arg(0) = string to parse
arg(1) = (Optional) default value to use should such a property not exist
